name: GO in PORTAL!
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

Something strange steals our hero. He finds himself in a new world, a world that wants to destroy it. 

Jump, move and beware of traps. Go to the end, defeating all enemies. It sounds corny, but just remember: it's not as easy as it seems ...

Recommended System Requierements:

Windows ХР, Vista, 7, 8, or 10

2 GB of RAM or higher
